ingest-processing.validation: Yes. See the validation scheme for TIFF 6.0 images.
ingest-processing.characterization: Yes. See the characterization scheme for TIFF 6.0 images.

action-plan.significant-properties:
TIFF exhibits the following significant properties (note 1). They are the significant properties which the FDA intends to preserve when adopting migration policy in the future.
Image width and image height.
Creating application information.
N/A
If a TIFF file contains multiple images, the sequence of the images in the TIFF file will be preserved.
X sampling frequency, Y sampling frequency, samples per pixel, bits per sample and extra samples.

long-term-strategy.original: See the long-term preservation strategy for TIFF 5.0 and TIFF 6.0.

action-plan.note: 1. InSPECT Project Document, “Significant Properties Testing Report: Raster Images”, March 15, 2009
